official.headline: Council Unifies
official.anchor_line: The Council reaches a unified decision amidst recent system challenges, ensuring a rapid response to stabilize BCI functions.
official.contextual_reframing: This collaboration highlights the resilience and adaptability of Stenograd's governance, reaffirming trust in the system's efficiency.

underground.headline: System Crisis!
underground.anchor_line: BCI outages expose the Council's cracks, throwing the city into chaos!
underground.contextual_reframing: Leaked footage reveals internal feuds and desperate cover-ups behind the façade of stability. Citizens stand against mismanagement!
